source.title: Install Tailwind CSS with Next.js - Tailwind CSS
source.description: Step-by-step guide to install and configure Tailwind CSS v4 in Next.js projects using PostCSS plugin and TypeScript setup.

source.title: Editor setup - Getting started - Tailwind CSS
source.description: Editor tooling for Tailwind CSS including VS Code IntelliSense extension, Prettier plugin for class sorting, and IDE support for syntax highlighting and autocomplete.

source.title: Compatibility - Getting started - Tailwind CSS
source.description: Browser support requirements, CSS preprocessor alternatives, CSS modules compatibility, and framework integration guidance for Vue, Svelte, and Astro with Tailwind CSS v4.

source.title: Styling with utility classes - Core concepts - Tailwind CSS
source.description: Core utility-first methodology covering variants, responsive design, dark mode, arbitrary values, class composition, complex selectors, managing duplication, and resolving style conflicts in Tailwind.

source.title: Hover, focus, and other states - Core concepts - Tailwind CSS
source.description: Comprehensive guide to variants including pseudo-classes (hover, focus, disabled), pseudo-elements (before, after, placeholder), media queries, ARIA states, data attributes, RTL support, and parent/sibling styling.

source.title: Colors - Core concepts - Tailwind CSS
source.description: Default OKLCH color palette with 11-step scales (50-950), color utilities, opacity modifiers, CSS variable referencing, custom palette creation, and dark mode support.

source.title: Adding custom styles - Core concepts - Tailwind CSS
source.description: Customising Tailwind via @theme directive, arbitrary values/properties/variants, custom CSS layers (base, components, utilities), @utility directive for functional utilities, and @custom-variant for custom selectors.

source.title: Detecting classes in source files - Core concepts - Tailwind CSS
source.description: Plain-text scanning mechanism, dynamic class name restrictions, @source directives for explicit registration, safelisting utilities with inline() and brace expansion, and excluding classes.

source.title: Functions and directives - Core concepts - Tailwind CSS
source.description: Reference for Tailwind CSS directives (@import, @theme, @source, @utility, @variant, @custom-variant, @apply, @reference) and functions (--alpha(), --spacing()) plus v3.x compatibility directives (@config, @plugin).

source.title: Dark mode - Core concepts - Tailwind CSS
source.description: Dark mode implementation using the dark: variant with prefers-color-scheme media query, manual class-based toggling, data attributes, and system theme synchronisation via localStorage.

source.title: Responsive design - Core concepts - Tailwind CSS
source.description: Mobile-first responsive breakpoints (sm, md, lg, xl, 2xl), custom breakpoints, max-width variants, breakpoint ranges, container queries with named containers and size variants, and arbitrary value support.

source.title: Theme variables - Core concepts - Tailwind CSS
source.description: Theme variables via @theme directive defining design tokens mapped to utilities, namespaces (color, font, spacing), default theme, customisation through extending/overriding, animation keyframes, inline/static options, CSS/JavaScript referencing.

source.title: font-family - Typography - Tailwind CSS
source.description: Utilities for controlling font-family including font-sans, font-serif, font-mono classes, custom values with arbitrary syntax, CSS variable integration, responsive variants, theme customisation with --font-* variables, font-feature-settings and @font-face integration.

source.title: Preflight - Base styles - Tailwind CSS
source.description: Opinionated base styles built on modern-normalize with complete CSS source covering margin/border/padding resets, unstyled headings and lists, block-level images, form input normalisation, extending Preflight, and disabling options.
